All field trips and major school events for the months of March and April have been cancelled or postponed. Please click on the \"COVID-19\" link for updates.","type":"overlay"}]}

div.div:
SYMPTOMS:
The CDC states that at this time, symptoms of COVID-19 may appear in as few as two days or as long as 14 after exposure. Reported illnesses have ranged from mild symptoms to severe illness and death for confirmed coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) cases. The CDC reports that symptoms can include:
*Fever
*Cough
*Shortness of breath or difficulty breathing
*Chills
*Repeated shaking with chills
*Muscle Pain
*Headache
*Sore Throat
*New loss of taste or smell
If you develop symptoms at any point, STAY HOME and contact your healthcare provider. Do not go directly to your provider's office, but CALL first to report your symptoms.
PRECAUTIONS:
*Wash your hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds. If soap and water are not available, use an alcohol-based hand sanitizer.
*Avoid touching your eyes, nose, and mouth with unwashed hands
*Avoid close contact with people who are sick.
*Stay home when you are sick.
*Cover your cough or sneeze with a tissue, then throw the tissue in the trash and wash your hands.
*Clean and disinfect frequently touched objects and surfaces.
*Practice Social Distancing as much as possible.
* CDC recommends wearing cloth face coverings in public settings where other social distancing measures are difficult to maintain. It is critical to emphasize that maintaining 6-feet social distancing remains important to slowing the spread of the virus.

div.div:
Anne T. Dunphy School in Williamsburg is offering a grab-and-go breakfast and lunch program to be held on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays.
Hampshire Regional High School in Westhampton is also holding a grab-and-go breakfast and lunch program to be held on Tuesdays and Thursdays.
These meals will be distributed between 11:00am-12:30pm at the respective school.
Meals at both sites will be distributed in a non-contact manner to ensure the safety of our staff members and our families.
These meals will be provided to any child 18 and under in our area towns and are free of cost.

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout that’s similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.
